name: 陳志恆
objective:
一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs 相律及其應用
二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。
三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。
四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。
五、相變化動力學簡介。
六、相圖測定簡介。
schedule:
第 1 週：Introduction and definition of terms
第 2 週：The first law of thermodynamics
第 3 週：The second law of thermodynamics
第 4 週：The statistical interpretation of entropy
第 5 週：Auxillary functions
第 6 週：Heat capacity, enthalpy, entropy
第 7 週：Phase equilibrium in a one-component system
第 8 週：The behavior of gases
第 9 週：期中考
第 10 週：The behavior of solutions
第 11 週：Gibbs free energy composition and phase diagrams of binary system
第 12 週：Reactions involving gases
第 13 週：Reactions involving pure condensed phases and a gasseous phase
第 14 週：Reaction equilibria in systems containing components in condensed solution
第 15 週：Phase diagrams for binary systems in pressure-temperature-composition sapce
第 16 週：Phase diagrams for binary systems in pressure-temperature-composition sapce
第 17 週：Electrochemistry
第 18 週：期末考
scorePolicy: 期中考 35%，期末考 35%，與上課表現 30%。
materials:
R.T. DeHuff, Thermodynamics in materials science, McGraw-Hill
Gaskell, Introduction of the thermodynamics of materials, Taylor & Francis。
consultation: 分機號碼 2719 辦公室材資館 415-3
remarks: 如受疫情影響將採用視訊教學。
